scenes.description: Hololive English -Advent- performs their song 'Genesis' in a stylized city environment.
The members transition to a beach setting and show off their new swimsuit outfits.

subtitles.original: Everybody, look! It's the beach!
subtitles.english: Everybody, look! It's the beach!

subtitles.original: It's the beach everywhere!
subtitles.english: It's the beach everywhere!

subtitles.original: It's amazing! Yeah! We're here!
subtitles.english: It's amazing! Yeah! We're here!

subtitles.original: Check it out! Swimsuits! Is that Mococo? It's so cute!
subtitles.english: Check it out! Swimsuits! Is that Mococo? It's so cute!

subtitles.original: Oh, this is nice. Yeah, I like it. It feels nice and breathable.
subtitles.english: Oh, this is nice. Yeah, I like it. It feels nice and breathable.

subtitles.original: I want to see everyone close up though. This is our first time wearing something like this, so...
subtitles.english: I want to see everyone close up though. This is our first time wearing something like this, so...

subtitles.original: Bijou, won't you show off what you've got to us?
subtitles.english: Bijou, won't you show off what you've got to us?

subtitles.original: Me first? Okay! Er...
subtitles.english: Me first? Okay! Er...

subtitles.original: What you lookin' at, huh? What you lookin' at?
subtitles.english: What you lookin' at, huh? What you lookin' at?

subtitles.original: Fine, you can look a little bit, okay?
subtitles.english: Fine, you can look a little bit, okay?

subtitles.original: Here we go! See my skirt? You like the skirt? It's so glossy!
subtitles.english: Here we go! See my skirt? You like the skirt? It's so glossy!

subtitles.original: Glossy! You're like a highlighter!
subtitles.english: Glossy! You're like a highlighter!

subtitles.original: Kira-kira! I'm gonna blind you!
subtitles.english: Kira-kira! I'm gonna blind you!

subtitles.original: Oh! My eyes! Don't do to us at the beach! Who's next?
subtitles.english: Oh! My eyes! Don't do to us at the beach! Who's next?

subtitles.original: Yeah, Fuwawa, take over! Go, go, go! It's sister time!
subtitles.english: Yeah, Fuwawa, take over! Go, go, go! It's sister time!

subtitles.original: Ah... This is kind of my first bathing suit, but, uh...

subtitles.original: What do you think?
